Disable Text Selection
You can use the
user-select
property to disable text selection of an element.
In web browsers, if you double-click on some text it will be 
selected/highlighted. This property can be used to prevent this.
Example
.prevent-select {
-webkit-user-select: none; /* Safari */
-ms-user-select: none; /* IE 10 and IE 11 */
user-select: none; /* 
  Standard syntax */
}

Tip:
Go to our
CSS user-select Reference
to learn 
more the user-select property.
